text:
(1) House of Refuge on Randall's Island; Hell Gate Bridge is seen in the right background. August 31, 1926. P.L. Sperr.

(2) The same, from another angle, four years later. July 31, 1930. P.L. Sperr.

(3) The same, at a later date. September 29, 1934. P.L. Sperr.
title: Islands - Randalls Island - House of Refuge.

text:
(1)
Harlem River, Manhattan shoreline, north from East 114th to 116th Streets, showing the Ward's Island Ferry landing, at the foot of East 116th Street. Also shown (right) are buildings on Randalls Island.
November 9, 1934.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, from a different angle.
November 9, 1934.

P. L. Sperr.

(3)
A closer view of the Ward's Island Ferry landing.
Autumn 1935.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Harlem River - Manhattan - Between East 114th and 116th Streets - [Ward's Island Ferry landing.]
